item.description:
Gordon's Annual Passover Wine Tasting 1pm - 4pm, please show up at 12:45PM so you can find me. Plus its gong to be cold and rainy out, so let's warm up to some fine wines.
Location: Gordon's Fine Wine & Culinary Center, 894 Main St, Waltham
 

Meet Biagio at 12:45 PM in the back classroom/cooking room so we can find each other and go through some friendly social introductions.

NOTE  21+ ID Required 

This Sunday Gordon's Fine Wine is hosting their annual Passover wine tasting at 894 Main St. location in Waltham.  This is a fantastic and unique opportunity to try over 100 different kosher wines from around the world!

They have a selection of more than 140 different kosher wines is by far the largest in New England and you will be amazed at how each year these wines get better and better.

They are also offering a special discount of 20% OFF any purchase of 6 or more bottles

 of kosher wine - This Sunday only!

 I think they will provide the wine glasses, but if you are worried please bring your own!

I hope to see you here!  L'chaim!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet Biagio at 12:45PM in the back classroom/cooking room so we can find each other.
item.name: Free Annual Passover Wine Tasting at Gordon's Fine Wine in Waltham, MA
